resources.string: To donate blood , kindly click on the option Donate Blood available on the home screen. Then fill up all the details and click on Submit Details Button. When the dialog box appears click on Yes button to submit your details.

To request blood , kindly click on the option Request Blood available on the home screen. Then list of the donors will appears who have given their details to donate blood , now click on Ask For Help Button available on the donors list. Now details of the donor will appear and you can easily Call or Message Donor by Clicking on the Call or Message buttons available.
